required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Fasting Comparative Bioavailability Study of 2 Meloxicam 15 mg Tablets in Healthy Volunteers Under Fasting Condition
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Single-dose, Crossover, Two-period, Two-sequence, Laboratory-blinded, Comparative Bioavailability Study of Meloxicam 15 mg Tablets in Healthy Volunteers Under Fasting Condition.

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of the study was to compare the bioavailability of two formulations of meloxicam given to healthy volunteers and to demonstrate bioequivalence. The test product, Reumoxicam速 15 mg tablets (Farmak PJSC, Ukraine), given in a single dose was compared with a licensed reference product Movalis 15 mg tablets ("Boehringer Ingelheim Ellas A.E.", Greece), in a randomized, laboratory-blind, single dose, two periods, crossover study.
The secondary objective of the trial was to investigate the safety of both preparations on the basis of safety clinical and laboratory examinations (at the beginning and at the end of the trial) and registration of adverse events and/ or adverse drug reactions.

detailed_description.textblock:
Randomized, single-dose, crossover, two-period, two-sequence, laboratory-blinded, comparative bioavailability study of test medicinal product Reumoxicam速 15 mg tablets (PJSC "Farmak", Ukraine) and reference medicinal product Movalis 15 mg tablets ("Boehringer Ingelheim Ellas A.E.", Greece) in healthy volunteers under fasting condition.
During each period 18 blood samples were taken: before dosing (0) and then at: 0.5; 1; 2; 3; 4; 4.5; 5; 5.5; 6; 7; 8; 10; 12; 24; 36; 48 and 72 hours after dosing.

primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to time t of the last quantifiable concentration

secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to infinity
time after administration to reach maximum drug concentration in plasma

arm_group.description: Movalis 15 mg tablets ("Boehringer Ingelheim Ellas A.E.", Greece)

intervention.description: One tablet was administered orally and swallowed at once, without chewing, by study volunteers, followed by 200 ml of water, under fasting condition (after preliminary nocturnal fasting for 12 hours) in the morning at 8:00 hours on Day I Period I and Period II of the study.

intervention.intervention_name: Movalis 15 mg tablets ("Boehringer Ingelheim Ellas A.E.", Greece)
intervention.description: One tablet was administered orally and swallowed at once, without chewing, by study volunteers, followed by 200 ml of water, under fasting condition (after preliminary nocturnal fasting for 12 hours) in the morning at 8:00 hours on Day I Period I and Period II of the study.
